sentences.en: Both traditional Chinese philosophy and socialist theory dispute that assumption.
sentences.cn: 传统中国哲学理论都对这个假设持批评态度.

sentences.en: Esperanto has always been popular among socialists.
sentences.cn: 世界语在社会主义者中一直很受欢迎。

sentences.en: For Lukacs , such division is social class, and thus follows Socialist Realism.
sentences.cn: 在卢卡奇那里, 划分方式是阶级.

sentences.en: Formation of the socialist market economy theory.
sentences.cn: 会主义市场经济理论的形成.

sentences.en: Greater efforts were made to promote socialist cultural and ideological progress.
New socialist countryside not be established without the support and guarantee of water resources.
sentences.cn: 新农村建设离不开水利的支撑和保障,水利的作用和功能集中体现在“四生”“五水”方面.

sentences.en: Socialist public property is sacred and inviolable.
sentences.cn: 国王是不可侵犯的;神圣的誓言.

sentences.en: Stacey , J . ( 1983 ), Patriarchy and socialist revolution in China. California : University of California Press.
sentences.cn: 巫昌祯: 《婚姻与继承法学》, [北京]中国政法大学出版社1997年版.

sentences.en: The crux of the matter is whether the road is capitalist or socialist.
sentences.cn: 要害是姓“资”还是姓“社”的问题.

sentences.en: This year, the global financial crisis made appeals to India's traditional socialist - style self - sufficiency even more popular.
sentences.cn: 今年, 全球金融危机使得人们对传统的 自给自足 经济模式颇为青睐.

sentences.en: Trade secret is a product of the development of socialist market economy.
sentences.cn: 商业秘密是市场经济发展的产物.
